text: tumhaari madad mein(pure) baqeel hai, phir jab khauf wa dehshath ka mauqa aa jaaye to aap unhe dekhenge ke aap ki taraf nazre jamaate hai aur un ki aankhe is tarah ghoomti hai jaise us shaqs ki jis par mauth ki ghashi taari, phir jab khauf jaata rehta hai, to tum par apni tez zabaano se badi baatein banaate hai, maal ke bade hee harees hai, ye imaan laaye hee nahi hai, Allah ta’ala ne un ke tamaam amaal na boodh kar diye aur Allah ta’ala par ye bahuth hee asaaan hai
